title: Owner of popular Moonshadows restaurant in Malibu, and son, killed in fiery crash
dc:creator: Salvador Hernandez
description: Andrea Bullo, owner of the popular Moonshadows restaurant in Malibu, was killed with his son in a fiery crash Tuesday.
content:encoded: Andrea Bullo, owner of the popular Moonshadows restaurant in Malibu, was killed with his son in a fiery crash Tuesday.

media:content.media:description: 052065.CA.0903.critic12.3.kpc--Malibu--Moonshadow restaurant has a new lounge area that gives a 180 degree view of the ocean.
